statements: DELETE FROM disposal_locations WHERE city = 'New York'
DELETE FROM disposal_locations WHERE location_id = 101 AND city = 'New York';
DELETE FROM disposal_locations WHERE material_type = 'Plastic' AND capacity < 1000;
DELETE FROM disposal_locations WHERE id = 1 AND disposal_date = '2022-05-31';
DELETE FROM recyclable_materials WHERE recycle_category = 'Plastic' AND material_id = 3;
DELETE FROM disposal_records WHERE quantity <= 10 AND disposal_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM disposal_locations WHERE capacity IS NULL AND location_name LIKE 'Abandoned%';
DELETE FROM recyclable_materials WHERE material_id in (SELECT material_id FROM disposal_records WHERE disposal_date < '2022-01-01');
DELETE FROM GlassMaterials WHERE glass_type='Clear Glass';
